page.title: 04WHAT WE LIKE ABOUT OUR AREA
page.content: { ANDREW}"Clock Face is a very good place for children to play because we can get conkers from the park." { RUSSELL}says that "our area is interesting because of the collieries." { JAYNE}"I like the nice old houses because they are made out of coloured stone and I like the shops."{ { NICOLA }likes "...the many trees and the grassy areas and the friendly people." { NICOLA'S MUM}"I like this area because there are plenty of amenities close by e.g., schools, libraries and shops. { SARAH}likes "the many clubs in the area." { PAUL}enjoys "...playing near Sutton Mill Dam and watching the wildlife." { MARTIN }says ".. it is a good area because we are near to Liverpool."
